title.abbrev: A Cable Television Industry Viewpoint on IPng

front.title: IPng Requirements: A Cable Television Industry Viewpoint

abstract.t: This document was submitted to the IETF IPng area in response to RFC 1550. Publication of this document does not imply acceptance by the IPng area of any ideas expressed within. The statements in this paper are intended as input to the technical discussions within IETF, and do not represent any endorsement or commitment on the part of the cable television industry or any of its companies. Comments should be submitted to the big-internet@munnari.oz.au mailing list.
